notes: For test inputs, 'pos' indicates the index (0-based) the tail connects to. -1 means no cycle. The 'pos' field is used to construct the linked list, not passed as a function argument.

testCases.explanation: Tail connects back to node at index 1

description:
Solve the **Linked List Cycle** problem.

See the full problem description on [LeetCode](https://leetcode.com/problems/linked-list-cycle/).

examples.explanation: Tail connects back to node at index 1
